title: It's not Riyal this time
content:
Again received a mail for constitution saying: 
' Please note the attendance is taken at three intervals of time, start,  middle and end of the class. You are marked present only if you are present in the all the three attendance downloads.

Inspite of reminders about maintaining 75% attendance for this course also, we find that the attendance is very low.
Please note that attendance is being monitored by the S&H office and it is mandatory that you attend all classes regularly. '

Plot twist : This time they sent an excel sheet of who attended last class and who did notðŸ’€.

EVS guys, u got this mail too?

comments.body: Ya we got it for evs as well
just fuckin login and mute man how difficult can it even be lmfao
